name: Ascension
description: Imbue one non-mythic creature/3 levels with mythic power.

name: Suffocation, Mass
description: One creature/level suffocates to death.

name: Wail of the Banshee
description: Deals 10 damage/level to 1 creature/level.

name: Soul Bind
description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

name: Foresight
description: "Sixth sense" warns of impending danger.

name: Dominate Monster
description: As dominate person, but any creature.

name: Teleportation Circle
description: Teleports creatures inside circle.
